item.title: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (英語：Christopher Asher WRAY)
item.description: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (Christopher Asher WRAY) Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For
